name: convert_get_symbol
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currencies_and_countries.
Tool description: Convert currencies, get country informations.
API description: It is the same thing with the convert endpoint. But this one can give you the symbol of the converted value.

amount.description: The amount of currency to convert. Defaults to '1'.

to.description: The target currency code. Defaults to 'USD'.

is_from.description: The source currency code. Defaults to 'EUR'.
